item.title: By: Anonymous

item.description: Devata...comes from div dhatu...means space....energy of space is devata...but this space is your own consciouness where your ego intellect n mind stay.
item.content:encoded: Devata…comes from div dhatu…means space….energy of space is devata…but this space is your own consciouness where your ego intellect n mind stay.
